body: Ok, I ended up reading everything till the end. This is pretty fucked up in the head and the story doesn't really have any feel-good moment. You'll mostly witness gratuitous torture, both physical and psychological, murders and other atrocities. The sex is simultaneously the center of the story and all but the driving force of the manhwa. I regret even starting this one. If you fap to this, you're a certified psycho.
I was about to comment "Fuck yeah, that's some good shit." before reading the follow up on another site and see them literally butcher each other with kitchen knives... It's turning very dark.
Man I wish the rest of the chapters where availibles

Great fantasy. It just really sad to see they all killing each other. Think this like every girl you love is killing and getting killed. It so sad if they would atleast understand the situation and price. Just enjoy the fcking hotel. Really mess up and almost all allies he had is getting killed. Would be nice if they don't kill someone that fast it hurt to see they get killed.
Did MC never fap to 2D girls 🤔🤔🤔

I came to fap. I left with a PhD in human psychology.

But seriously, this thing is reeeally fucking interesting.

@nobody123nobody If its up to him, he wants to fuck them all. Also, as you can see, MC can just outnumbered and killed if he goes full genocide.
Also, the remaning ones may not want to do it with a serial killer, lol.

Once someone die the mc no longer have to fuck them and the died one return to where they were brought from and the manager will not protect anyone so if mc really dont wanna go into hell than can't he just kill all the people except few whom he can fuck?
I hate to admit this, the story starting to look like a biggest game of Among Us lol.

i like the story so far and Im expecting more. very believable, the character reaction to events are what I would expect if someone is in the situation.

 if the average is 20, times 100 is still 2000 times. i dont know who would masturbate that many times to a single woman.

we have to find some way to eat! 

**looks at dead body**

Me : please don't

I like the mc, and how the char progresses. Mc is on power tripping right now and he doesn't know yet how to deal with these many girls who want a piece of him. Maybe as the story progresses we can see Mc getting a hold of the situation, instead of being controlled / manipulated by these bitches.

The MC is such a fucking turd...he actually thought that the girl had accepted the master slave relationship and was blaming other for killing her when she killed herself 

I would like to see the girls really kill him
Didn't expect to see any gore. The behaviors of people seems are pretty realistic so ill give it a 7.5/10. The Mc is an idiot though.
The main character is such a fucking idiot. I'm wishing he dies in a horrible way.
